name: Apimondia
description: International federation of beekeepers’ associations; congresses, working groups, and policy statements.

name: International Bee Research Association (IBRA)
description: Publishes Journal of Apicultural Research and Bee World; education and outreach.

name: COLOSS Association
description: International research network on managed bee health; producer of the BEEBOOK methods.

name: FAO – International Pollinators Initiative (IPI)
description: UN-level umbrella programme supporting pollinator-friendly agriculture and national strategies.

name: EU Bee Partnership / EU Pollinator Hub
description: European collaboration sharing data on bee and pollinator health and pressures.

name: National Bee Unit (BeeBase)
description: Statutory bee health service for England & Wales; guidance, alerts and notifiable diseases.

name: American Beekeeping Federation (ABF)
description: National industry body representing U.S. beekeepers; advocacy and annual conference.

name: Canadian Honey Council (CHC)
description: National industry association for Canadian beekeepers; resources and policy engagement.

name: Pollinator Partnership (Bee Friendly Farming)
description: Non-profit running habitat and education programs; Bee Friendly Farming certification for growers.

name: Bee Informed Partnership
description: Long-running U.S. colony loss and management surveys plus extension resources.

name: USDA-ARS Bee Research Labs
description: U.S. federal research centers working on bee health, nutrition, genetics, and management.

name: British Beekeepers Association (BBKA)
description: Charity supporting beekeeping education and local association network across England and Wales.
